HOME.ERRORONROUTE: There was an error initiating your route. Please ensure you have internet connection and GPS and try again!
HOME.ERRORUPLOADROUTE: There was an error uploading your route report!
HOME.NOBINSPICKED: No bins have been collected. The route will be ignored. Are you sure?

LOGIN.INVALIDPLATE: Please enter a valid vehicle plate
LOGIN.PLATEINFO: There was a problem getting the vehicle info!
LOGIN.NOVEHICLE: Could not find a vehicle with those plates!
LOGIN.ROUTEINFO: There was a problem getting the route info!
LOGIN.NOROUTES: No routes available for chosen vehicle!
LOGIN.INFOPROBLEM: There was a problem getting the info!
LOGIN.NOINTERNET: Please make sure you are connected to the internet and try again!
LOGIN.UNSENTROUTE: A previous unsent route exists in storage

BINREPORT.TOOFARAWAYERROR: You are too far away from your next bin. Please get closer to it!

SERVICES.NOINTERNET: No internet connection found. Storing data for when internet becomes available
